title: Zootopia
short_plot_summary: A rabbit police officer and a con artist fox team up to solve a mystery that threatens the harmony of their city, Zootopia.
explanation: A rabbit, representing Judy Hopps, the main character and rookie police officer
A cityscape, symbolizing the diverse and bustling city of Zootopia where the story takes place
A fox, illustrating Nick Wilde, the cunning con artist who teams up with Judy Hopps
Paw prints, representing the investigation and mystery-solving aspect of the story
A police officer, signifying the law enforcement and crime-fighting theme in the movie
